name: Environment Inc.
description:
Who will save the world? Everyone has asked this question before. In Environment Inc., our new strategy game, it can be you!
    Let yourself be tempted by our two ultra realistic modes: Ocean and Forest. Both modes take into account many criteria such as global warming, pollution, fishing and hunting to offer you an exceptional level of realism. And this while remaining perfectly optimized for all devices.
    Launch the app, choose a mode and take control of an ecological transition operation. Buy new technology, make the right decisions, and you may be able to save the ocean or manage a forest sustainably.
    Don't like advertisements? We neither! That's why we've made the choice to only offer rewarded ads that you watch if you want.
    Do you find strategy games too complex? Think about the last time you didn't understand the principle of a game, that was frustrating, right? But don't worry, our game comes with an interactive tutorial so you can figure out how the game works in minutes. And if you're still in doubt, a help platform is built into the app.
    No network? No problem! Our app works perfectly offline. You will be able to take it everywhere. Whether you are on a plane, a bus or deep in the countryside, Environment Inc. stays in your pocket!
